scripts.minify:js: npm run preminify:js && terser javaScript/*.js -o dist/javaScript/main.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify:css: npm run preminify:css && usemin index.html -d  dist --htmlin -o dist/css/main.min.css
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify-html: html-minifier --input-dir HTML --output-dir dist/HTML --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments && html-minifier --input-dir ./ --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run minify:img && npm run minify && npm run minify-html
